結附於生物或鵬洛客

mainBoard.name: Nahiri's Binding

rulings.text: A planeswalker enchanted this way may be attacked.

Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written "[Cost]: [Effect]." Some keyword abilities are activated abilities and will have a colon in their reminder text. Triggered abilities (starting with "when," "whenever," or "at") are unaffected.
No abilities of the enchanted permanent can be activated, including mana abilities.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature or planeswalker
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

mainBoard.flavorText: Hatred is a potent ally, but an insatiable master.

foreignData.flavorText: Hass ist ein mächtiger Verbündeter, aber auch ein unersättlicher Gebieter.

mainBoard.name: Commander's Sphere
mainBoard.originalText:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Commander's Sphere's first ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Commander's Sphere's first ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.flavorText: Ora Ondar, the Khalni Garden, is a lush tangle of growth in the harsh lands of Akoum. Its plant growth is marvelously diverse: a brilliant spectrum of vibrant life . . . and speedy death.

foreignData.flavorText: Ora Ondar, der Khalni-Garten, ist ein üppiges Wirrwarr von Wachstum in den rauen Ländern von Akoum. Seine Pflanzen wachsen wunderbar vielfältig und bilden ein brillantes Spektrum an pulsierendem Leben … und schnellem Tod.
foreignData.name: Tajuru-Fäulnisklinge
foreignData.text: Todesberührung

foreignData.flavorText: Los jardines de Khalni de Ora Ondar son una exuberante maraña de malezas que se encuentran en las duras tierras de Akoum. La diversidad de sus plantas es soberbia; una gama sin igual de la vida... y de las muertes rápidas.
foreignData.name: Hojaponzoña de Tajuru
foreignData.text: Toque mortal.

foreignData.flavorText: Ora Ondar, le jardin de Khalni, est un enchevêtrement luxuriant situé au milieu des terres rudes d'Akoum. Les plantes qui y poussent sont merveilleusement variées : c'est un spectre fascinant de vie... et de mort rapide.
foreignData.name: Pestelame de Tajuru
foreignData.text: Contact mortel

foreignData.flavorText: Ora Ondar, il Giardino di Khalni, è un rigoglioso intreccio di vegetazione nelle aspre terre di Akoum. Le sue piante sono meravigliosamente eterogenee: una splendente varietà di vita fiorente... e morte repentina.
foreignData.name: Tossilama Tajuru
foreignData.text: Tocco letale

foreignData.flavorText: オラ・オンダール、つまりカルニの庭は、アクームの厳しい土地で絡まり合う繁茂である。その地の植物は驚愕の多様性を見せる。鮮やかな生命の輝かしい混合と、速やかな死が、そこにある。
foreignData.name: タジュールの荒廃刃
foreignData.text: 接死
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: 칼니 정원인 오라 온다르는 아쿰의 거친 대지 속에서 자라난 것들이 뒤엉켜 있는 곳이다. 그곳의 식물들의 성장 방식은 놀라울 정도로 다양하다. 활기찬 생명이 영롱하게 펼쳐진 것과 동시에 . . . 빠른 죽음도 함께 있다.
foreignData.name: 타주루 역병칼날
foreignData.text: 치명타

foreignData.flavorText: Ora Ondar, o Jardim de Khalni, é um emaranhado exuberante nas terras agrestes de Akoum. A flora é maravilhosamente diversa, um brilhante espectro de vida vibrante... e mortes rápidas.
foreignData.name: Venenolâmina Tajuru
foreignData.text: Toque mortífero

foreignData.flavorText: Ора-Ондар, Сад Кални, — это заросли пышной растительности в суровых землях Акума. Флора здесь удивительно разнообразная — полный спектр яркой жизни... и быстрой смерти.
foreignData.name: Клинок Погибели из Таджуру
foreignData.text: Смертельное касание

foreignData.flavorText: 欧拉昂达又称坎尼花园，是阿库姆荒地中一处葱郁丛林。此处植物种类繁多、包罗万象：既有茁壮成长的盎然生机. . .也有能迅速致命的剧烈毒物。
foreignData.name: 特裘如枯刃客
foreignData.text: 死触

foreignData.flavorText: 歐拉昂達又稱坎尼花園，是阿庫姆荒地中一處蔥鬱叢林。此處植物種類繁多、包羅萬象：既有茁壯成長的盎然生機. . .也有能迅速致命的劇烈毒物。
foreignData.name: 特裘如枯刃客
foreignData.text: 死觸

mainBoard.name: Tajuru Blightblade

foreignData.name: Bruna vom Alabasterschwarm
foreignData.text:
Fliegend, Wachsamkeit
Immer wenn Bruna vom Alabasterschwarm angreift oder blockt, kannst du eine beliebige Anzahl an Auren im Spiel an sie anlegen und eine beliebige Anzahl an Aura-Karten, die sie verzaubern könnten, aus deinem Friedhof und/oder deiner Hand an sie angelegt ins Spiel bringen.

foreignData.name: Bruna, Luz de Alabastro
foreignData.text:
Vuela, vigilancia.
Siempre que Bruna, Luz de Alabastro ataque o bloquee, puedes anexarle cualquier cantidad de Auras que haya en el campo de batalla y puedes poner en el campo de batalla, anexadas a ella, cualquier cantidad de cartas de Aura que puedan encantarla desde tu cementerio y/o tu mano.

foreignData.name: Bruna, Lumière d'albâtre
foreignData.text:
Vol, vigilance
À chaque fois que Bruna, Lumière d'albâtre attaque ou bloque, vous pouvez lui attacher n'importe quel nombre d'auras sur le champ de bataille et vous pouvez mettre sur le champ de bataille, attachées à elle, n'importe quel nombre de cartes d'aura qui pourraient l'enchanter depuis votre cimetière et/ou votre main.

foreignData.name: Bruna, Luce di Alabastro
foreignData.text:
Volare, cautela
Ogniqualvolta Bruna, Luce di Alabastro attacca o blocca, puoi assegnarle un qualsiasi numero di Aure sul campo di battaglia e puoi mettere sul campo di battaglia a lei assegnate un qualsiasi numero di carte Aura che possono incantarla dal tuo cimitero e/o dalla tua mano.

foreignData.name: 雪花石を率いる者、ブルーナ
foreignData.text:
飛行、警戒
雪花石を率いる者、ブルーナが攻撃かブロックするたび、あなたは戦場にあるオーラ望む数をこれにつけてもよく、あなたの墓地や手札からこれをエンチャントできるオーラ・カード望む数を、これにつけられた状態で戦場に出してもよい。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 天使

foreignData.name: Bruna, Luz do Bando Alabastro
foreignData.text:
Voar, vigilância
Toda vez que Bruna, Luz do Bando Alabastro, ataca ou bloqueia, você pode anexar a ela um número qualquer de Auras do campo de batalha, e pode colocar no campo de batalha anexado a ela qualquer número de cards de Aura que poderiam encantá-la vindos de seu cemitério e/ou de sua mão.

mainBoard.name: Bruna, Light of Alabaster
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever Bruna, Light of Alabaster attacks or blocks, you may attach to it any number of Auras on the battlefield and you may put onto the battlefield attached to it any number of Aura cards that could enchant it from your graveyard and/or hand.

rulings.text: All of these Auras will become attached to Bruna before combat damage is dealt. If Bruna is attacking, these Auras become attached before blockers are declared.

Only Auras that could legally enchant Bruna may be attached to it, whether they’re being moved from other permanents or being put onto the battlefield. An Aura with “enchant land,” for example, could not be attached to Bruna this way.

mainBoard.text:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever Bruna, Light of Alabaster attacks or blocks, you may attach to it any number of Auras on the battlefield and you may put onto the battlefield attached to it any number of Aura cards that could enchant it from your graveyard and/or hand.

foreignData.name: Vraska die Unbetrachtete
foreignData.text:
+1: Immer wenn bis zu deinem nächsten Zug eine Kreatur Vraska der Unbetrachteten Kampfschaden zufügt, zerstöre die Kreatur.
−3: Zerstöre eine bleibende Nichtland-Karte deiner Wahl.
−7: Erzeuge drei 1/1 schwarze Assassine-Kreaturenspielsteine mit „Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, verliert der Spieler die Partie."

foreignData.text:

-7 : Créez trois jetons de créature 1/1 noire Assassin avec « À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, ce joueur perd la partie. »

foreignData.name: Vraska l'Invisibile
foreignData.text:
+1: Fino al tuo prossimo turno, ogniqualvolta una creatura infligge danno da combattimento a Vraska l'Invisibile, distruggi quella creatura.
-3: Distruggi un permanente non terra bersaglio.
-7: Crea tre pedine creatura Assassino 1/1 nere con "Ogniqualvolta questa creatura infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, quel giocatore perde la partita".

foreignData.name: 見えざる者、ヴラスカ
foreignData.text:
+1：あなたの次のターンまで、クリーチャー１体が見えざる者、ヴラスカに戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのクリーチャーを破壊する。
-3：土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
-7：「このクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのプレイヤーはこのゲームに敗北する。」を持つ黒の１/１の暗殺者・クリーチャー・トークンを３体生成する。
foreignData.type: 伝説のプレインズウォーカー — ヴラスカ

−3: Destrua a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno.
−7: Crie três fichas de criatura preta 1/1 do tipo Assassino com "Toda vez que esta criatura causa dano de combate a um jogador, aquele jogador perde o jogo."

foreignData.name: Враска Невидимая
foreignData.text:
+1: до вашего следующего хода каждый раз, когда существо наносит боевые повреждения Враске Невидимой, уничтожьте то существо.
—3: уничтожьте целевой не являющийся землей перманент.
—7: создайте три фишки существа 1/1 черный Убийца со способностью «Каждый раз, когда это существо наносит боевые повреждения игроку, тот игрок проигрывает партию».

mainBoard.name: Vraska the Unseen
mainBoard.originalText:
+1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to Vraska the Unseen, destroy that creature.
−3: Destroy target nonland permanent.
−7: Create three 1/1 black Assassin creature tokens with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

rulings.text: Each Assassin token’s triggered ability will trigger whenever it deals combat damage to any player, including you.
If an effect creates a copy of one of the Assassin creature tokens, the copy will also have the triggered ability.

mainBoard.text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to Vraska the Unseen, destroy that creature.
[−3]: Destroy target nonland permanent.
[−7]: Create three 1/1 black Assassin creature tokens with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

mainBoard.flavorText: Wizards' spells twist the fabric of reality to channel elemental energies, peer into the future, and even calm the Roil.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Sprüche der Zauberer verdrehen die Struktur der Realität, um elementare Energien zu kanalisieren, in die Zukunft zu blicken und sogar die Turbulenz zu beruhigen.
foreignData.name: Wahrsagerin der Expedition
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Solange du einen anderen Zauberer kontrollierst, hat die Wahrsagerin der Expedition „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, ziehe eine Karte."

foreignData.flavorText: La magia de los hechiceros distorsiona la estructura de la realidad con tal de canalizar energías elementales, prever el futuro e incluso calmar la Turbulencia.
foreignData.name: Adivina de la expedición
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Mientras controles otro Hechicero, la Adivina de la expedición tiene "Cuando esta criatura muera, roba una carta".

foreignData.flavorText: Les sorciers déforment la réalité grâce à leurs sorts pour canaliser les énergies élémentaires, lire l'avenir et même calmer le Roulis.
foreignData.name: Devineresse d'expédition
foreignData.text:
Vol
Tant que vous contrôlez un autre sorcier, la Devineresse d'expédition a « Quand cette créature meurt, piochez une carte. »

foreignData.flavorText: Gli incantesimi dei maghi ritorcono il tessuto della realtà per incanalare energie elementali, vedere nel futuro e perfino calmare il Torbido.
foreignData.name: Divinatrice della Spedizione
foreignData.text:
Volare
Fintanto che controlli un altro Mago, la Divinatrice della Spedizione ha "Quando questa creatura muore, pesca una carta".

foreignData.flavorText: 魔術師の呪文は現実の織り目を捻じ曲げて自然界のエネルギーと繋がり、未来を覗き乱動をも鎮める。
foreignData.name: 探検隊の占者
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなたが他のウィザードをコントロールしているかぎり、探検隊の占者は「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、カードを１枚引く。」を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: 마법사들의 주문은 정령들의 에너지를 끌어들이고, 미래를 엿보며, 탁류를 진정시키기 위해 현실을 비틀어낸다.
foreignData.name: 탐험 역술가
foreignData.text:
비행
당신이 다른 마법사를 조종하는 한, 탐험 역술가는 "이 생물이 죽을 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다."를 가진다.

foreignData.flavorText: As mágicas dos magos distorcem o tecido da realidade para canalizar energias elementais, vislumbrar o futuro e até mesmo acalmar o Turbilhão.
foreignData.name: Adivinha da Expedição
foreignData.text:
Voar
Enquanto você controla outro Mago, Adivinha da Expedição tem "Quando esta criatura morrer, compre um card".

foreignData.flavorText: Заклинания чародеев меняют ткань реальности, чтобы укротить стихийную энергию, заглянуть в будущее и даже успокоить Великий Вал.
foreignData.name: Предсказательница Экспедиции
foreignData.text:
Полет
Пока вы контролируете другого Чародея, Предсказательница Экспедиции имеет способность «Когда это существо умирает, возьмите карту».

foreignData.flavorText: 法师咒语能够扭曲现实束缕，从而通联元素能量、窥见未来世界，甚或平息暴怒狂搅。
foreignData.name: 探险队占卜师
foreignData.text:
飞行
只要你操控另一个法术师，探险队占卜师便具有「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」

foreignData.flavorText: 法師咒語能夠扭曲現實束縷，從而通聯元素能量、窺見未來世界，甚或平息暴怒狂攪。
foreignData.name: 探險隊占卜師
foreignData.text:
飛行
只要你操控另一個魔法師，探險隊占卜師便具有「當此生物死去時，抽一張牌。」

mainBoard.name: Expedition Diviner

rulings.text: Expedition Diviner has just one instance of its triggered ability, no matter how many other Wizards you control beyond the first.

If Expedition Diviner dies at the same time that each other Wizard you control leaves the battlefield, its ability triggers. For example, if the only creatures you control are two Expedition Diviners and both die at the same time, their abilities each trigger.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
As long as you control another Wizard, Expedition Diviner has "When this creature dies, draw a card."

foreignData.name: Feuerspucker-Lagac
foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, fügt der Feuerspucker-Lagac jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.name: Lagac escupefuego
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el Lagac escupefuego hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente.

foreignData.name: Lagac crachefeu
foreignData.text: Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le Lagac crachefeu inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire.

foreignData.name: Lagac Sputafuoco
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, il Lagac Sputafuoco infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario.

foreignData.name: 火吐きラガーク
foreignData.text: 上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、火吐きラガークは各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — トカゲ

foreignData.name: 불을 뿜는 라각
foreignData.text: 대지력 — 대지가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 불을 뿜는 라각은 각 상대에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreignData.name: Lagac Cospe-fogo
foreignData.text: Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, Lagac Cospe-fogo causa 1 ponto de dano a cada oponente.

foreignData.name: Плюющийся Огнем Лагак
foreignData.text: Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Плюющийся Огнем Лагак наносит 1 повреждение каждому оппоненту.

foreignData.name: 喷火勒嘎
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，喷火勒嘎向每位对手各造成1点伤害。

foreignData.name: 噴火勒嘎
foreignData.text: 地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，噴火勒嘎向每位對手各造成1點傷害。

mainBoard.name: Spitfire Lagac

rulings.text: A landfall ability doesn’t trigger if a permanent already on the battlefield becomes a land.

A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Spitfire Lagac’s ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

mainBoard.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, Spitfire Lagac deals 1 damage to each opponent.
